Ask HN: Why do you need to deplete ThinkPad E14 battery to max life?
text:
In the official Lenovo User Guide for a new ThinkPad E14 Gen 2 some options to maximize battery life are: • Use the battery until the charge is depleted. • Recharge the battery completely before using it.

In the nearest months I may not need to run the laptop on battery only, so there will always be an AC power supply. Should I deplete the battery charge to max its life?

How can battery charge depletion maximize its life?

Ask HN: Possible to Deepfake my fantasy football punishment using consumer AI?
text:
I got last in my fantasy football league and the punishment is to record a video of myself counting from 1 to 10,000. is there consumer available AI that could deepfake this using

- chat GPT to generate text script of 1 - 10,000

- something that would take voice samples from me and turn that script into close enough reading in my voice - something would take pictures of me and output video of me reading with that voice script from dead on “zoom pov”?

Ask HN: How to develop software as a medical device (SaMD)?
text:
Hey HN!

Would be amazing if anyone can provide guidance or resources for creating a mobile app that is certified as a medical device (SaMD). In the UK, I'm aware we would need to comply with various ISO standards, notify the MHRA and complete a feasibility study to show an evidence base, but I'm finding it very difficult to map out the actual roadmap towards getting regulatory approval (e.g. FDA, CE marking, MHRA), what is necessary for compliance or finding consultancies or agencies that work in this area. Thanks so much.

Show HN: The first SuperApp social network – need your feedback
text:
Qocial.com offers p2p chat between people, businesses, and different entities in your neighbourhood. We never store your personal chat. Instead, all chats are synced when both parties are online for messages sent when one of the users is offline.

We allow Local vendors to create their shop page to sell their products or services. We currently offer Cash on Delivery and Pickup for Businesses outside India. For Indian users, we provide an online checkout experience for the products or services they sell on our platform.

Landing page - https://qocial.com

Shop page - https://qocial.com/shop/category/apparel-and-accessories

Business page with Products:

- WomenCart ( outside India ) - https://qocial.com/business/womencart/product

- Grocery Store ( from India ) - https://qocial.com/business/panditjigeneralstore/product

We are SuperApp in the true sense. All in 1 app. We offer you Locally Stored data-based Todo, Notes, Reminder and other features like Expense Management and Accounts Management. They are stored locally in your system without being shared with us or any other users, and we offer them for free.

We have many other free hidden features that other companies charge you hundreds of dollars. Join today to discover those features.

Our tech architecture is complex, and we compromised a few features for scalability reasons. But as we grow and become profitable, we will 100% find ways to get those done. Currently, we are bootstrapped.

Feel free to share any feedback you have. We are a remarkable team, improving user experience every day. Thus, we are open to feedback. We are all ears and will look at all possibilities of received feedback and suggestions.

Thanks
